CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(UPPER(Name), "ROUTE"), "ROUTE", IF(CONTAINS(UPPER(Name), "SECTIONS"), "SECTIONS", IF(CONTAINS(UPPER(Name), "TERRYTORY"), "TERRYTORY", IF(CONTAINS(UPPER(Name), "NON SERVICE"), "NON SERVICE", IF(CONTAINS(UPPER(Name), "UNDERLAY"), "UNDERLAY", "NO TYPE")))))
CustomField.label: Type
